001package ca.gc.cra.radar.adapter.kafka;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterOutputPort.PosterReport;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.poster.PosterPipeline;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
008import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
009import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
010import java.io.IOException;
011import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
012import java.time.Duration;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Base64;
015import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Locale;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.Objects;
020import java.util.Properties;
021import java.util.StringJoiner;
022import java.util.UUID;
023import java.util.function.Supplier;
024import java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream;
025import java.util.zip.InflaterInputStream;
026import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.Consumer;
027import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerConfig;
028import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord;
029import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecords;
030import org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.KafkaConsumer;
031import org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.StringDeserializer;
032
033/**
034 * Kafka-backed poster pipeline that consumes serialized HTTP message pairs and renders poster
035 * reports.
036 * <p>Implements the infrastructure side of {@link PosterPipeline} for HTTP, building reports from
037 * JSON records produced by {@link HttpKafkaPersistenceAdapter}. Instances are not thread-safe;
038 * create one pipeline per running CLI.
039 *
040 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
041 */
042public final class HttpKafkaPosterPipeline implements PosterPipeline {
043  private final String bootstrapServers;
044  private final Supplier<Consumer<String, String>> consumerSupplier;
045
046  /**
047   * Creates a poster pipeline that consumes HTTP pair records from Kafka.
048   *
049   * @param bootstrapServers comma-separated Kafka bootstrap servers
050   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code bootstrapServers} is {@code null}
051   * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code bootstrapServers} is blank
052   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
053   */
054  public HttpKafkaPosterPipeline(String bootstrapServers) {
055    this(bootstrapServers, null);
056  }
057
058  HttpKafkaPosterPipeline(String bootstrapServers, Supplier<Consumer<String, String>> consumerSupplier) {
059    this.bootstrapServers = Objects.requireNonNull(bootstrapServers, "bootstrapServers").trim();
060    if (this.bootstrapServers.isEmpty()) {
061      throw new IllegalArgumentException("bootstrapServers must not be blank");
062    }
063    this.consumerSupplier = consumerSupplier != null ? consumerSupplier : this::createConsumer;
064  }
065
066  /**
067   * Identifies the protocol handled by this pipeline.
068   *
069   * @return {@link ProtocolId#HTTP}
070   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
071   */
072  @Override
073  public ProtocolId protocol() {
074    return ProtocolId.HTTP;
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Streams Kafka records and emits formatted poster reports through the supplied output port.
079   *
080   * @param config per-protocol configuration; must provide the Kafka input topic
081   * @param decodeMode requested decode behavior for HTTP payloads
082   * @param outputPort destination for rendered poster reports
083   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code config} or {@code outputPort} is {@code null}
084   * @throws Exception if Kafka consumption or report rendering fails
085   * @implNote Polls Kafka in 500 ms intervals and stops after several idle polls or interrupt.
086   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
087   */
088  @Override
089  public void process(
090      PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig config,
091      PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode,
092      PosterOutputPort outputPort) throws Exception {
093    Objects.requireNonNull(config, "config");
094    Objects.requireNonNull(outputPort, "outputPort");
095
096    String topic = config.kafkaInputTopic()
097        .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("http kafka input topic required"));
098
099    try (Consumer<String, String> consumer = consumerSupplier.get()) {
100      consumer.subscribe(List.of(topic));
101      int idlePolls = 0;
102      final int maxIdlePolls = 10;
103      while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
104        ConsumerRecords<String, String> records = consumer.poll(Duration.ofMillis(500));
105        if (records.isEmpty()) {
106          if (++idlePolls >= maxIdlePolls) {
107            break;
108          }
109          continue;
110        }
111        idlePolls = 0;
112        for (ConsumerRecord<String, String> record : records) {
113          HttpPair pair = parsePair(record.value());
114          if (pair == null) {
115            continue;
116          }
117          String content = formatPair(pair, decodeMode);
118          long ts = pair.startTs > 0 ? pair.startTs : pair.endTs;
119          PosterReport report = new PosterReport(ProtocolId.HTTP, pair.txId, ts, content);
120          outputPort.write(report);
121        }
122      }
123    }
124  }
125
126  private Consumer<String, String> createConsumer() {
127    Properties props = new Properties();
128    props.put(ConsumerConfig.BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS_CONFIG, bootstrapServers);
129    props.put(ConsumerConfig.KEY_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringDeserializer.class.getName());
130    props.put(ConsumerConfig.VALUE_DESERIALIZER_CLASS_CONFIG, StringDeserializer.class.getName());
131    props.put(ConsumerConfig.GROUP_ID_CONFIG, "radar-poster-http-" + UUID.randomUUID());
132    props.put(ConsumerConfig.AUTO_OFFSET_RESET_CONFIG, "earliest");
133    props.put(ConsumerConfig.ENABLE_AUTO_COMMIT_CONFIG, "true");
134    return new KafkaConsumer<>(props);
135  }
136
137  private static HttpPair parsePair(String json) {
138    if (json == null || json.isBlank()) {
139      return null;
140    }
141    try {
142      String txId = extractString(json, "txId");
143      long startTs = extractLong(json, "startTs", 0L);
144      long endTs = extractLong(json, "endTs", 0L);
145      Endpoint client = parseEndpoint(extractObject(json, "client"));
146      Endpoint server = parseEndpoint(extractObject(json, "server"));
147      HttpMessage request = parseMessage(extractObject(json, "request"));
148      HttpMessage response = parseMessage(extractObject(json, "response"));
149      return new HttpPair(txId, startTs, endTs, client, server, request, response);
150    } catch (Exception ex) {
151      return null;
152    }
153  }
154
155  private static Endpoint parseEndpoint(String json) {
156    if (json == null || json.isBlank()) {
157      return new Endpoint("0.0.0.0", 0);
158    }
159    String ip = extractString(json, "ip");
160    int port = (int) extractLong(json, "port", 0L);
161    return new Endpoint(ip, port);
162  }
163
164  private static HttpMessage parseMessage(String json) {
165    if (json == null || json.isBlank() || json.equals("null")) {
166      return null;
167    }
168    long timestamp = extractLong(json, "timestamp", 0L);
169    String firstLine = extractString(json, "firstLine");
170    String headers = extractString(json, "headers");
171    String bodyB64 = extractString(json, "bodyB64");
172    byte[] body = bodyB64.isEmpty() ? new byte[0] : Base64.getDecoder().decode(bodyB64);
173    int status = (int) extractLong(json, "status", 0L);
174    Map<String, String> attributes = parseAttributes(extractObject(json, "attributes"));
175    return new HttpMessage(timestamp, firstLine, headers, body, status, attributes);
176  }
177
178  private static Map<String, String> parseAttributes(String json) {
179    Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
180    if (json == null || json.length() < 2) {
181      return map;
182    }
183    int idx = 0;
184    while (idx < json.length()) {
185      int keyStart = json.indexOf('"', idx);
186      if (keyStart < 0) {
187        break;
188      }
189      int keyEnd = findStringEnd(json, keyStart + 1);
190      if (keyEnd < 0) {
191        break;
192      }
193      String key = unescape(json.substring(keyStart + 1, keyEnd));
194      int colon = json.indexOf(':', keyEnd);
195      if (colon < 0) {
196        break;
197      }
198      int valueStart = json.indexOf('"', colon);
199      if (valueStart < 0) {
200        break;
201      }
202      int valueEnd = findStringEnd(json, valueStart + 1);
203      if (valueEnd < 0) {
204        break;
205      }
206      String value = unescape(json.substring(valueStart + 1, valueEnd));
207      map.put(key, value);
208      idx = valueEnd + 1;
209    }
210    return map;
211  }
212
213  private static int findStringEnd(String json, int start) {
214    boolean escaping = false;
215    for (int i = start; i < json.length(); i++) {
216      char c = json.charAt(i);
217      if (escaping) {
218        escaping = false;
219        continue;
220      }
221      if (c == '\\') {
222        escaping = true;
223        continue;
224      }
225      if (c == '"') {
226        return i;
227      }
228    }
229    return -1;
230  }
231
232  private static String unescape(String value) {
233    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(value.length());
234    boolean escaping = false;
235    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
236      char c = value.charAt(i);
237      if (escaping) {
238        switch (c) {
239          case '"' -> sb.append('"');
240          case '\\' -> sb.append('\\');
241          case 'n' -> sb.append('\n');
242          case 'r' -> sb.append('\r');
243          case 't' -> sb.append('\t');
244          default -> sb.append(c);
245        }
246        escaping = false;
247      } else if (c == '\\') {
248        escaping = true;
249      } else {
250        sb.append(c);
251      }
252    }
253    if (escaping) {
254      sb.append('\\');
255    }
256    return sb.toString();
257  }
258
259  private static String extractObject(String json, String key) {
260    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
261    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
262    if (idx < 0) {
263      return null;
264    }
265    int braceStart = json.indexOf('{', idx + token.length());
266    if (braceStart < 0) {
267      int nullStart = json.indexOf("null", idx + token.length());
268      if (nullStart == idx + token.length()) {
269        return "null";
270      }
271      return null;
272    }
273    int depth = 0;
274    for (int i = braceStart; i < json.length(); i++) {
275      char c = json.charAt(i);
276      if (c == '{') {
277        depth++;
278      } else if (c == '}') {
279        depth--;
280        if (depth == 0) {
281          return json.substring(braceStart, i + 1);
282        }
283      }
284    }
285    return null;
286  }
287
288  private static String extractString(String json, String key) {
289    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
290    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
291    if (idx < 0) {
292      return "";
293    }
294    int startQuote = json.indexOf('"', idx + token.length());
295    if (startQuote < 0) {
296      return "";
297    }
298    int endQuote = findStringEnd(json, startQuote + 1);
299    if (endQuote < 0) {
300      return "";
301    }
302    return unescape(json.substring(startQuote + 1, endQuote));
303  }
304
305  private static long extractLong(String json, String key, long defaultValue) {
306    String token = '"' + key + '"' + ":";
307    int idx = json.indexOf(token);
308    if (idx < 0) {
309      return defaultValue;
310    }
311    int start = idx + token.length();
312    int end = start;
313    while (end < json.length() && (json.charAt(end) == '-' || Character.isDigit(json.charAt(end)))) {
314      end++;
315    }
316    if (end == start) {
317      return defaultValue;
318    }
319    try {
320      return Long.parseLong(json.substring(start, end));
321    } catch (NumberFormatException ex) {
322      return defaultValue;
323    }
324  }
325
326  private static String formatPair(HttpPair pair, PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode) {
327    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(2048);
328    sb.append("=== HTTP REQUEST ===\n");
329    if (pair.request != null) {
330      appendHttpSection(sb, pair.txId, pair.client, pair.server, true, pair.request, decodeMode);
331    } else {
332      sb.append("(no request captured)\n");
333    }
334    sb.append('\n');
335    sb.append("=== HTTP RESPONSE ===\n");
336    if (pair.response != null) {
337      appendHttpSection(sb, pair.txId, pair.client, pair.server, false, pair.response, decodeMode);
338    } else {
339      sb.append("(no response captured)\n");
340    }
341    return sb.toString();
342  }
343
344  private static void appendHttpSection(
345      StringBuilder sb,
346      String txId,
347      Endpoint client,
348      Endpoint server,
349      boolean request,
350      HttpMessage message,
351      PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode) {
352    if (message == null) {
353      sb.append("# ").append(request ? "request" : "response").append(" missing\n\n");
354      return;
355    }
356    HttpMessage decoded = decodeHttpMessage(message, decodeMode);
357    Endpoint src = request ? client : server;
358    Endpoint dst = request ? server : client;
359    sb.append("# id: ").append(txId).append('\n');
360    sb.append("# timestamp_us: ").append(decoded.timestamp()).append('\n');
361    sb.append("# src: ").append(src.ip()).append(':').append(src.port()).append('\n');
362    sb.append("# dst: ").append(dst.ip()).append(':').append(dst.port()).append('\n');
363    sb.append('\n');
364    if (decoded.firstLine() != null && !decoded.firstLine().isBlank()) {
365      sb.append(decoded.firstLine()).append('\n');
366    }
367    String headers = decoded.headers();
368    if (headers != null && !headers.isBlank()) {
369      for (String line : headers.split("\r?\n")) {
370        if (line.isEmpty()) {
371          continue;
372        }
373        sb.append(line).append('\n');
374      }
375    }
376    if (decoded.status() > 0) {
377      sb.append("# status: ").append(decoded.status()).append('\n');
378    }
379    Map<String, String> attrs = decoded.attributes();
380    if (attrs != null && !attrs.isEmpty()) {
381      StringJoiner joiner = new StringJoiner(", ");
382      attrs.forEach((k, v) -> joiner.add(k + '=' + v));
383      sb.append("# attrs: ").append(joiner.toString()).append('\n');
384    }
385    sb.append('\n');
386    appendBody(sb, decoded.body());
387  }  private static HttpMessage decodeHttpMessage(HttpMessage message, PosterConfig.DecodeMode mode) {
388    if (message == null || message.body().length == 0) {
389      return message;
390    }
391    byte[] originalBody = message.body();
392    byte[] workingBody = originalBody;
393    Map<String, String> headerMap = new LinkedHashMap<>(headerMap(message.headers()));
394    if (mode.decodeTransferEncoding()) {
395      String transfer = headerMap.getOrDefault("Transfer-Encoding", "");
396      if (!transfer.isBlank() && transfer.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).contains("chunked")) {
397        try {
398          workingBody = decodeChunked(workingBody);
399          headerMap.remove("Transfer-Encoding");
400          headerMap.put("Content-Length", Integer.toString(workingBody.length));
401        } catch (Exception ignore) {
402          workingBody = originalBody;
403        }
404      }
405    }
406    if (mode.decodeContentEncoding()) {
407      String encoding = headerMap.getOrDefault("Content-Encoding", "");
408      String lower = encoding.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
409      try {
410        if (lower.contains("gzip")) {
411          workingBody = decodeGzip(workingBody);
412          headerMap.remove("Content-Encoding");
413          headerMap.put("Content-Length", Integer.toString(workingBody.length));
414        } else if (lower.contains("deflate")) {
415          workingBody = decodeDeflate(workingBody);
416          headerMap.remove("Content-Encoding");
417          headerMap.put("Content-Length", Integer.toString(workingBody.length));
418        }
419      } catch (Exception ignore) {
420        workingBody = originalBody;
421      }
422    }
423    String rebuiltHeaders = headerMap.isEmpty() ? message.headers() : rebuildHeaders(headerMap);
424    return new HttpMessage(
425        message.timestamp(),
426        message.firstLine(),
427        rebuiltHeaders,
428        workingBody,
429        message.status(),
430        message.attributes());
431  }  private static Map<String, String> headerMap(String headers) {
432    Map<String, String> map = new LinkedHashMap<>();
433    if (headers == null) {
434      return map;
435    }
436    for (String line : headers.split("\r?\n")) {
437      int colon = line.indexOf(':');
438      if (colon > 0) {
439        String name = line.substring(0, colon).trim();
440        String value = line.substring(colon + 1).trim();
441        if (!name.isEmpty()) {
442          map.put(name, value);
443        }
444      }
445    }
446    return map;
447  }
448
449  private static String rebuildHeaders(Map<String, String> headers) {
450    if (headers.isEmpty()) {
451      return "";
452    }
453    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
454    headers.forEach((k, v) -> sb.append(k).append(':').append(' ').append(v).append('\n'));
455    return sb.toString().trim();
456  }
457
458  private static void appendBody(StringBuilder sb, byte[] body) {
459    if (body.length == 0) {
460      sb.append("(empty body)\n");
461      return;
462    }
463    if (isLikelyText(body)) {
464      String text = new String(body, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);
465      sb.append(text);
466      if (!endsWithNewline(text)) {
467        sb.append('\n');
468      }
469    } else {
470      sb.append("[binary payload ").append(body.length).append(" bytes]\n");
471      sb.append(hexDump(body));
472    }
473  }
474
475  private static byte[] decodeChunked(byte[] body) throws IOException {
476    ByteArrayInputStream in = new ByteArrayInputStream(body);
477    ByteArrayOutputStream out = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
478    while (true) {
479      String line = readLine(in);
480      if (line == null) {
481        break;
482      }
483      int size = Integer.parseInt(line.trim(), 16);
484      if (size == 0) {
485        break;
486      }
487      byte[] chunk = in.readNBytes(size);
488      out.write(chunk);
489      // consume CRLF
490      in.read();
491      in.read();
492    }
493    return out.toByteArray();
494  }
495
496  private static String readLine(ByteArrayInputStream in) {
497    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
498    int b;
499    while ((b = in.read()) >= 0) {
500      if (b == '\r') {
501        int next = in.read();
502        if (next == '\n') {
503          break;
504        }
505      }
506      sb.append((char) b);
507    }
508    if (sb.isEmpty()) {
509      return null;
510    }
511    return sb.toString();
512  }
513
514  private static byte[] decodeGzip(byte[] data) throws IOException {
515    try (GZIPInputStream gis = new GZIPInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(data))) {
516      return gis.readAllBytes();
517    }
518  }
519
520  private static byte[] decodeDeflate(byte[] data) throws IOException {
521    try (InflaterInputStream iis = new InflaterInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(data))) {
522      return iis.readAllBytes();
523    }
524  }
525
526  private static boolean isLikelyText(byte[] data) {
527    int limit = Math.min(data.length, 64);
528    for (int i = 0; i < limit; i++) {
529      int b = data[i] & 0xFF;
530      if (b == 0) {
531        return false;
532      }
533      if (b < 0x09 || (b > 0x0D && b < 0x20)) {
534        return false;
535      }
536    }
537    return true;
538  }
539
540  private static boolean endsWithNewline(String text) {
541    return text.endsWith("\n") || text.endsWith("\r");
542  }
543
544  private static String hexDump(byte[] data) {
545    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(data.length * 3);
546    for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
547      if (i > 0 && (i % 16) == 0) {
548        sb.append('\n');
549      }
550      int b = data[i] & 0xFF;
551      sb.append(Character.forDigit((b >>> 4) & 0xF, 16));
552      sb.append(Character.forDigit(b & 0xF, 16));
553      sb.append(' ');
554    }
555    return sb.toString().trim();
556  }
557
558  private record Endpoint(String ip, int port) {}
559
560  private record HttpMessage(
561      long timestamp,
562      String firstLine,
563      String headers,
564      byte[] body,
565      int status,
566      Map<String, String> attributes) {
567    HttpMessage {
568      body = body != null ? body : new byte[0];
569      attributes = attributes != null ? attributes : Map.of();
570    }
571  }
572
573  private record HttpPair(
574      String txId,
575      long startTs,
576      long endTs,
577      Endpoint client,
578      Endpoint server,
579      HttpMessage request,
580      HttpMessage response) {}
581}
